The advances were confirmed by DR Congo sources. 🇨🇩🇷🇼⚡- BREAKING: M23 have captured the strategic city of Nyabibwe, Bukavu direction, eastern DR Congo - Kivu Morning Post, DR Congo outlet confirms the advances.M23 have also captured the towns of Bushushu, Majibu, Dutu, Mbunje and Bukiri. The fall of Nyabibwe now allows M23 to launch an offense on the South Kivu region capital, Bukavu, which is just 38 km from M23's current positions. M23's had previously denied trying to capture Bukavu.DR Congo military sources claim M23's ceasefire was a media stunt, and that the group restarted military operations within hours after the announcement.

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Russia prepares first visit to new Syria? ❗️Mosco...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Russia prepares first visit to new Syria?❗️Moscow intends to send a delegation to Damascus amid active contacts with the country's new authoritiesMikhail Bogdanov, Russian Deputy FM may become the first Russian official to visit Syria since the fall of the Assad regime. However, the date of the visit has not yet been set and the originally planned trip is to be postponed.Russian FM Sergei Lavrov said Moscow is ready to cooperate with Syria's new leadership. Bogdanov had emphasised relations between Russia and Syria are entering a new qualitative turning point, and both sides must build on the deep legacy of friendship between the Russian and Syrian peoples.Lavrov discussed the situation in Syria with the Saudi FM. The ministers spoke in favor of establishing inclusive dialogue on Syria that would involve all political forces, ethnic groups, and confessions as well as foreign players who push for maintaining Syria’s sovereignty, independence, unity, and territorial integrity.Telegram | X

Title: 🇵🇸🇮🇱⚡️- Israeli Defense Minister Katz has cancelled all admin...
Description: 🇵🇸🇮🇱⚡️- Israeli Defense Minister Katz has cancelled all administrative detention orders against West Bank settlers.Administrative detention is the practice of arresting individuals and holding them without trial for upwards of 6 months, although it may be indefinitely renewed by Israeli authorities. The practice is primarily used against Palestinians, however many settlers are held in administrative detention as well.With the Defense Minister's order to release all West Bank settlers from administrative detention, this could have dire consequences for Palestinians living in the West Bank.

Description: 🇺🇸⚡️- Donald Trump has announced plans to create an External Revenue Service to collect tariffs, duties, and other revenues from foreign sources.  Historically, this function was performed by the US Revenue Cutter Service, the predecessor to the US Coast Guard, until it was reorganized in 1915. Title: 🎬 🇮🇷⚡- -These are false notions created by the oppressors that...
Description: 🇮🇷⚡- -These are false notions created by the oppressors that claim these [Hezbollah, Hamas, Ansarullah, etc.] are Iran's proxies.They [who say such things] want us to turn the fight against the occupation [Israel]. They want a conflict between Iran and Israel [a first, a senior Iranian official calling Israel by Israel]. But this is not a fight between Iran and Israel!Iran only provides moral support to these forces [Hezbollah, Hamas, etc.]. This motivational [moral] support is Iran's power. But we did not hire them to act on our behalf.What we did was give people the ability to believe that they could stand up. Our revolution gave them this motivation.- - Mohammad Javad Zarif, Vice President for Strategic Affairs and former Foreign Minister of Iran.Israel has hit Iran and pro-Iranian groups so hard since October 7th 2023, that even Iran is now confused on which side they stand.

Title: 🔁 ⚡️🇸🇦🇸🇾 Outcome of the Riyadh Meetings on Syria ❗️Participa...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇸🇦🇸🇾 Outcome of the Riyadh Meetings on Syria❗️Participants at the meeting called for immediate Israeli withdrawal from occupied Syrian territories in the south but ignored Turkish occupation in the north-eastThe foreign ministers and representatives of Arab and Western countries discussed the steps to support the Syrian people and provide them with all the aid and support in this critical phase of their history. The discussions also focused on helping Syrians to rebuild their country as a unified, independent and safe Arab state for all its citizens, with no place for terrorism, no breach of its sovereignty or aggression on its territorial integrity from any party.The participants discussed their support for a Syrian political transitional process represented by Syrian political and social forces that preserves the rights of all Syrians with the participation of various components of the Syrian people. This is also to work to address any challenges or sources of concern for various parties through dialogue and providing support, advice and consultation in a manner that respects Syria's independence and sovereignty, taking into account that the future of Syria is the concern of the Syrians, stressing their support for the choices of the Syrian people and respecting their will.❗️The ministers also expressed their concern about Israel's incursion into the buffer zone with Syria and the neighboring sites in Mount Hermon and Quneitra governorate, stressing the importance of respecting Syria's unity, sovereignty and territorial integrity.⁉️ However, the discussions noticeably avoided addressing Turkey's ongoing military operations and occupation of cities in NE Syria. The extensive attacks and alleged violations by Turkish forces were absent from the statement, despite their continued impact on the region and Syrian stability.Telegram | X

Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾⚡- Russian military general in Syria, Oleg Blokhin, says ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾⚡- Russian military general in Syria, Oleg Blokhin, says -for four days our military convoys have been stuck,- and our -ships have been standing at anchor since January 5- in Syria. He says the new authorities won't supply electricity to the Russian military units, as a result the Russians are unable to withdraw.-It has not yet been possible to agree on a normal solution for the evacuation of our base,- says Blokhin. And says that the Russian units in Syria have been -taken hostage,- with the new Syrian government -resorting to blackmail.- Blokhin says that the Syrian government has cut all communications with Russia's main Khmeimim military base, and are seeking to -communicate with someone of higher rank- in Moscow.With the reason being for -Russia to remove the status of terrorists from Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, and Abu Muhammad al-Julani.- The second reason being -is to demand payment for the opportunity to calmly evacuate our bases. And the payment, in addition to money, may include food and fuel, which the new authorities of the former Syria are running out of catastrophically quickly.-

Drone footage confirms the advance, showing Russian troops inside Pogrebki's church, which we have geolocated to 51.37812, 35.227. In Nikolaevka, fierce fighting continues. 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - It has been 5 months since Ukraine launched its ambitious Kursk military operation.Ukraine currently controls 427.5 sqkm of Kursk, while Russia has recaptured 683 sqkm of area.In the same time of 5 months, Russia has captured:311 sqkm in the Kupyansk-Borova direction;174 sqkm in the Limen-Sivers'k direction;54 sqkm in the Chasov-Yar direction;554 sqkm in the Toretsk-Pokrovsk direction;1661 sqkm in the Kurakhovo-Velikaya Novoselka direction and80 sqkm in the Gulyaipoloe-Orekhov direction.In total, Russian forces have captured 3517 sqkm (including recaptured Kursk territory), which is over 8 times more than what Ukraine currently holds in Kursk (427.5 sqkm). Some of the fronts in the Donbass region had not moved for two years up until the Kursk operation began, however, the Ukrainian authorities are still adamant the Kursk operation did not affect the front elsewhere.
